## Bio

Cameron Jester is a senior Data Science and Analytics student at Simmons University with a minor in Statistics. She is from the New Hampshire Seacoast, now residing in Boston, Massachusetts. In school, she enjoys investigating statistical inferences using RStudio (her favorite package is 'Infer'), learning about machine learning methodologies, and discussing the cross-section between data science and social sciences. Outside of school, Cameron is passionate about reading (especially science fiction), watching sports, and perfecting the art of coffee making.
